body_html:
Hi,
I use TensorFlow v0.11.0 RC0.
A simple Alexnet model while training with batch size 128 eats up to 4800 MiB (with config.gpu_options.allow_growth = True),
while the same model on caffe with bach size 128 takes roughly 2700MiB.

And the speed is not fast (~2 times slower than caffe).

body:
Hi,
I use  TensorFlow v0.11.0 RC0.
A simple Alexnet model while training with batch size 128  eats up to 4800 MiB (with config.gpu_options.allow_growth = True),  
while the same model on caffe with bach size 128 takes roughly 2700MiB.

And the speed is not fast (~2 times slower than caffe).
